comment: Base implementation of AbstractJsonConstructor for constructors that take parameters.
codesample:
%REM
Creates a custom constructor to call a Pet&apos;s New method, which takes two parameters - name and type, in that order.
This code is found in deser-80 sample.
%END REM
Dim pet as Pet
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper
Dim petConstructor as New JsonCustomConstructor()
Call petConstructor.withParam(&quot;name&quot;, &quot;&quot;).withParam(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;&quot;)
Set pet = helper.withCustomConstructor(petConstructor)._
    toObject(source, &quot;Pet&quot;, &quot;deser-80&quot;)._
    fromJson(source)
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Base implementation of AbstractJsonConstructor for constructors that take parameters.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Base implementation of AbstractJsonConstructor for constructors that take parameters.
inlinecomment: ' Base implementation of AbstractJsonConstructor for constructors that take parameters.
codesamplehtml: %REM<br />Creates a custom constructor to call a Pet&apos;s New method, which takes two parameters - name and type, in that order.<br />This code is found in deser-80 sample.<br />%END REM<br />Dim pet as Pet<br />Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper<br />Dim petConstructor as New JsonCustomConstructor()<br />Call petConstructor.withParam(&quot;name&quot;, &quot;&quot;).withParam(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;&quot;)<br />Set pet = helper.withCustomConstructor(petConstructor)._<br />    toObject(source, &quot;Pet&quot;, &quot;deser-80&quot;)._<br />    fromJson(source)

methods.label: createObject
methods.codesample:
%REM
Creates an instance of className as defined in a script file called libName, and assigns it to mainHolder&apos;s contents property.
The code is an abbreviated version of code in JsonConversionHelper.toObject().
%END REM
Me.mainHolder.isObject = True
Dim noArgsConstructor as New JsonNoArgsConstructor()
Set Me.mainHolder.contents = noArgsConstructor.createObject(className, libName)
methods.signature: Public Function createObject(className As String, libName As String) As Variant
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Overridden function</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM<br />Creates an instance of className as defined in a script file called libName, and assigns it to mainHolder&apos;s contents property.<br />The code is an abbreviated version of code in JsonConversionHelper.toObject().<br />%END REM<br />Me.mainHolder.isObject = True<br />Dim noArgsConstructor as New JsonNoArgsConstructor()<br />Set Me.mainHolder.contents = noArgsConstructor.createObject(className, libName)

methods.label: withContext
methods.comment: Passes a JSON object from which to extract parameter values
methods.codesample:
%REM
If a constructor is defined for the JsonConversionHelper, it is used to create an instance of className as defined in a script file called libName, using as its context a JsonObject (source) and the current jsonConversionHelper&apos;s list of converters.
The code is an abbreviated version of code in JsonConversionHelper.toObject().
%END REM
If Not Me.constructor is Nothing Then
    SetMe. mainHolder.contents = Me.constructor.withContext(source, Me.converters).createObject(className, libName)
End If
methods.argumentsuffix: (source As JsonObject, converters List As AbstractJsonConverter)
methods.signature: Public Function withContext(source As JsonObject, converters List As AbstractJsonConverter) As JsonCustomConstructor
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Passes a JSON object from which to extract parameter values</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

methods.label: withLiteralParam
methods.comment: Fluent method to pass a literal value as a parameter for the constructor
methods.codesample:
%REM
Ensures that when extracting the gender element from a JSON object, the target class&apos;s setGender method is called with the literal value &quot;M&quot;. 
This is found in the CustomSetterTest sample, a hard-coded test for validation purposes only.
%END REM
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()
Dim genderConverter as New JsonSetterConverter()
Call genderConverter.forSetter(setGender).withLiteralParam(&quot;M&quot;)
Call helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;gender&quot;, genderConverter)
methods.signature: Public Function withLiteralParam(paramVal As Variant) As JsonCustomConstructor
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Fluent method to pass a literal value as a parameter for the constructor</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Fluent method to pass a literal value as a parameter for the constructor
methods.inlinecomment: ' Fluent method to pass a literal value as a parameter for the constructor
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM<br />Ensures that when extracting the gender element from a JSON object, the target class&apos;s setGender method is called with the literal value &quot;M&quot;. <br />This is found in the CustomSetterTest sample, a hard-coded test for validation purposes only.<br />%END REM<br />Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper()<br />Dim genderConverter as New JsonSetterConverter()<br />Call genderConverter.forSetter(setGender).withLiteralParam(&quot;M&quot;)<br />Call helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;gender&quot;, genderConverter)

methods.label: withParam
methods.comment: Fluent method to retrieve a parameter value for the constructor from the JSON object or a default value to use if the label is not in the JSON object.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The code below calls the Session class&apos;s New method passing two parameters, the JSON object&apos;s &quot;id&quot; and &quot;title&quot; elements, in that order.
The code can be found in the deser-70.txt example.
%END REM
Dim sess as Session
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper
Dim sessionConstructor as New JsonCustomConstructor
Dim json as String
  
json = |{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;Ad01&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Domino HA&quot;}|
Call sessionConstructor.withParam(&quot;id&quot;, &quot;&quot;).withTitle(&quot;title&quot;, &quot;&quot;)
Set sess = helper.withCustomConstructor(sessionConstructor).fromJsonString(json, &quot;Session&quot;, &quot;deser-70&quot;)
methods.signature: Public Function withParam(labelName As String, defaultValue As Variant) As JsonCustomConstructor
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Fluent method to retrieve a parameter value for the constructor from the JSON object or a default value to use if the label is not in the JSON object.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Fluent method to retrieve a parameter value for the constructor from the JSON object or a default value to use if the label is not in the JSON object.
